name: Quantum Purse
description: Quantum Purse is an innovative anti-quantum wallet built on the Nervos CKB (Common Knowledge Base) blockchain, designed to provide cutting-edge security for digital assets in a post-quantum computing world. By integrating a CKB light node, Quantum Purge enables users to interact with the blockchain directly from their web browsers, eliminating the need for heavy software installations while maintaining efficiency and accessibility. This seamless browser-based functionality is a standout technical feature, making the wallet user-friendly and highly adaptable to various devices and environments.

highlights.title: First Spark Projects Grantee
highlights.description: Selected as the inaugural recipient of the Spark Projects Fund, recognizing its innovative potential

highlights.title: Anti-Quantum Wallet
highlights.description: Utilizes advanced anti-quantum algorithms to safeguard digital assets against future quantum computing threats

highlights.title: CKB Light Client Integration
highlights.description: Runs a CKB light client directly in browsers, enabling seamless blockchain interaction without heavy software

highlights.title: Browser-Based Accessibility
highlights.description: Operates entirely within web browsers, offering user-friendly access across devices with minimal setup

related.title: JoyID
related.desc: Multi-chain identity protocol allows users to manage digital identity.

faq.a: Yes. When you use Quantum Purse, a browser-based light client will be running in the background, which will help you manage wallet in a self-custody way.
